2000530.name: Terminal Madness - The Awakening
2000530.description:
Crypto wants to become a hacker. Not just any, but an elite hacker trained by the legendary Supreme Hacker.
After a long time of searching, Crypto has finally found a track that can bring him closer to his dream. All he has to do is find the Supreme Hacker and convince him that he wants to become the greatest hacker of all time. But Crypto soon realizes that things aren't that simple, as he finds himself trapped and reality starts to shift.


Key features:
- An extraordinary, branching and evolving story that won’t let you think of anything else.
- Ingenious puzzles that create a fun and seductive plot from the beginning.
- A fun and interactive comedy full of humor.
- Incredible illustrations.
- Different levels of difficulty
- Texts in English, German, Spanish and Catalan.

What to expect with this game:
Terminal Madness 2 Awakening is the sequel and continues the story of Crypto, who tries to achieve his dream and become the greatest hacker in the world. Help Crypto to overcome all odds and immerse yourself in this fun, classic styled point and click adventure game.
2000530.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 加泰罗尼亚语
